BOOK_EXISTS: Book with the same title already exists
PERMISSION_DENIED: You do not have permission. Only the author can update the book
BOOK_NOT_FOUND_IN_INVENTORY: Book not found in this library inventory
BOOK_NOT_BORROWED_BY_USER: You cannot return a book that you did not borrow
LIBRARY_ALREADY_EXISTS: A library with this name already exists
ACCESS_DENIED: You do not have access to this resource
LIBRARY_NOT_FOUND_OR_EMPTY_INVENTORY: Library not found or inventory is empty
ACCESS_DENIED_TO_ADD_BOOK: You do not have access to add books to this library
BOOK_ALREADY_IN_INVENTORY: Book already exists in the inventory
LIBRARY_ID_AND_BOOK_ID_REQUIRED: Library ID and Book ID are required
ACCESS_DENIED_TO_REMOVE_BOOK: You do not have access to remove books from this library
NAME_EMAIL_PASSWORD_REQUIRED: Name, email, and password are required
LIBRARY_BOOK_ID_REQUIRED: Library Id and book Id is required
